summary.para: The HTTP_ENABLED_STATE enumeration defines the state of a request queue, server session, or URL Group.
This enumeration is used in the struct

member.name: HTTP_ENABLED_STATE.HttpEnabledStateActive
member.summary: The HTTP Server API object is enabled.

member.name: HTTP_ENABLED_STATE.HttpEnabledStateInactive
member.summary: The HTTP Server API object is disabled.
